introduction: Surrealism / Abstraction / Social CommentaryOrbital Discourse is a meditation on the relationship between self-perception and ideological bickering.::During last year's protests, I was watching the news while making breakfast and the arguing on screen mirrored the pot of boiling water on my stove.::I made the film by myself with film equipment and a pot of boiling water.::Connect with Marc:instagram: @McPhotog, @GlassCabinFilmstwitter: @McPhotog, @GlassCabinFilmsfacebook: MarcCartwright, GlassCabinFilms
